Description.Name: Sample hardware abstraction for MT3620 RDB
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This file defines the mapping from the MT3620 reference development board (RDB) to the
// 'sample hardware' abstraction used by the samples at https://github.com/Azure/azure-sphere-samples.
// Some peripherals are on-board on the RDB, while other peripherals must be attached externally if needed.
// See TODO(85663) for more information on how to use hardware abstractions
// to enable apps to work across multiple hardware variants.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_UART
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 RDB: Connect header 2, pin 1 (RX) to header 2, pin 3 (TX).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 RDB: Connect external LSM6DS3 to I2C using header 4, pin 6 (SDA) and pin 12 (SCL)

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 RDB: Connect external LSM6DS3 to SPI using header 4, pin 5 (MISO), pin 7 (SCLK), pin 9 (CSA), pin 11 (MOSI)

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI_CS
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SPI Chip Select (CS) value "A". This is not a peripheral identifier, and so has no meaning in an app manifest.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_RESET
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 RDB: Connect external NRF52 RESET GPIO using header 2, pin 4

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_DFU
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 RDB: Connect external NRF52 DFU GPIO using header 2, pin 14

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_UART
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 RDB: Connect external NRF52 UART using header 2, pin 1 (RX), pin 3 (TX), pin 5 (CTS), pin 7 (RTS)
